text:
@BorisJohnson Don’t try associating the public with you using #Covid19 to solve the #CareCrisis you created over 10yrs in government, that cost 10 THOUSAND #CareHomes deaths, then there’s the 35k deaths in the community due to your FAILURES

@SkyNews @Bbcnews @LBC #c4news #Dailybriefings #NHS
